sentences.cn: ...这个国家两位最富有的商业巨头。

sentences.en: A three - inch refractor will give an excellent view as well as showing Titan.
sentences.cn: 一架三英寸的折射望远镜就能看到极好的景象,还可以看出土卫六.

sentences.en: Because Titan is Saturn's largest moon, it held special interest for us.
sentences.cn: 由于土卫六是最大的卫星, 因此我们对它特别感兴趣.

sentences.en: Clotho weaves thread of life for every mortal, god and titan.
sentences.cn: 克洛索为每个凡人 、 灵和泰坦纺织生命线.

sentences.en: Kratos pushes the fingers of the mighty Titan apart once again.
sentences.cn: 奎托斯再次推开泰坦的手指.

sentences.en: Scientists have long conjectured that oceans of liquid methane exist on Titan.
sentences.cn: 科学家一直猜想土卫六上存在着由液态甲烷构成的海洋.

sentences.en: The largest moon, Titan, is larger than earth.
sentences.cn: 最大的卫星, TITAN, 比地球还大.

sentences.en: The thermochemical properties of reaction N ++ H 2→ NH ++ H have been computed under Titan � � s atmosphere conditions.
sentences.cn: 依据Titan大气的压强和温度条件计算了N++H2→NH++H反应的热化学函数.

sentences.en: The Titan begins to crush Kratos using his two fingers.
sentences.cn: 泰坦再次发力以手指挤压奎托斯.

sentences.en: The way you've passed these last three days might knock up a Titan.
sentences.cn: 你这三天来的生活方式会使任何人病倒的.

sentences.en: The workers quickly moved another huge Titan rocket into place.
sentences.cn: 工作人员迅速将另一枚巨大的大力神火箭安排就位.

sentences.en: They would not succumb to this Titan who was bent on undoing them.
sentences.cn: 他们不愿向这个专门要损害他们的“巨人”让步.

sentences.en: TITAN : Each plate contains agarose in barbital buffer with 0.02 % thimerosal added as a preservative.
sentences.cn: TITAN:每皿含有琼脂醣在巴比妥〔二乙基丙二醯尿素〕缓冲剂中,并加了0.02%有机汞作为防腐剂.

sentences.en: Titan mode changes the control points to missile silos.
sentences.cn: 泰坦模式改变了导弹发射井的控制点.

sentences.en: What would be liquid on Titan, where surface temperatures are - 180 degrees Celsius ?
sentences.cn: 究竟是什麽液体,能存在于 -180 的泰坦表面 呢 ?

sentences.en: Zeus saw through the trick and felt displeased at the Titan's favour towards men.
sentences.cn: 宙斯识破了这套把戏,普罗米修斯对人类的偏爱让他很不高兴.

trans.tran_cn: 巨子；巨人；成就非凡的人
trans.tran_en: a very strong or important person
